The Facebook post was published by a pag: id, which had a Samsung logo as its profile picture and contained an image of smartphones.
The post: s caption translated to English as an announcement to help students in need of smartphones for studying during the Covid-19 pandemic.
The claim stated that the first 5: 000 people who wrote the word 'SAMSUNG' without interruption would receive iPhone mobile phones.
Samsung Indonesia confirmed that the Fac: id did not belong to them and labeled the claim as a scam, stating that they only operate one official Facebook page with a verified blue tick.
